desc.p: This is the animation that sparked this entire experiment.

Sometime in early 2018, I decided to learn a little about SVG's <animate/> element. However after playing around with it for a while I decided to lean into using CSS animations. From past experience I knew that I could style SVGs using CSS (see the controls of my Chaos Game experiment), but I did not know that you could include full stylesheets inside of SVGs.
See this animation in action here: https://andrew.wang-hoyer.com/experiments/svg-animations/01/a.
